casebody.data:
Mary T. McKINLEY, Appellee, v. CARNEGIE-ILLINOIS STEEL CORPORATION, Appellant. No. 9195. Circuit Court of Appeals, Third Circuit. Argued Oct. 21, 1946. Decided Nov. 1, 1946. Ira R. Hill, of Pittsburgh, Pa. (Reed, Smith, Shaw & McClay, of Pittsburgh, Pa., on the brief), for appellant. Hyman $chlesinger, of Pittsburgh, Pa,, for appellee.

Before BIGGS, ALBERT LEE STEPHENS, andKALODNER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

An examination of the appendices and consideration of the briefs and the oral argument in this case convince us that the court below committed no error. Accordingly the judgment, 66 F.Supp. 703, is affirmed.
